snippet: China’s investigation of Vice Minister Ma Jian was the latest demonstration of President Xi Jinping’s drive to consolidate control of the levers of Communist Party power.
abstract: China's anticorruption agency announces that Vice Min Ma Jian, senior official in Ministry of State Security, is under investigation, disclosure that is unusual breach in secrecy maintained over government corruption.
lead_paragraph: China’s investigation of Vice Minister Ma Jian was the latest demonstration of President Xi Jinping’s drive to consolidate control of the levers of Communist Party power.

headline.main: Chinese Anticorruption Agency Investigates a Security Official
headline.print_headline: Chinese Anticorruption Agency Investigates a Security Official

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection (Communist Party of China)

keywords.value: Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China
